deprecated_yaml.title: YAML configuration is deprecated
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Cover Time Based using YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

Please remove the YAML configuration and recreate your covers using the UI: **Settings > Devices & Services > Helpers > Create Helper > Cover Time Based**.

set_known_position.name: Set cover position
set_known_position.description: Sets a known position for the cover internally.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the cover to set the position for.

position.name: Position
position.description: The position of the cover, between 0 and 100.

set_known_tilt_position.name: Set cover tilt position
set_known_tilt_position.description: Sets a known tilt position for the cover internally.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the cover to set the tilt position for.

position.name: Position
position.description: The tilt position of the cover, between 0 and 100.

start_calibration.name: Start calibration
start_calibration.description: Start a calibration test to measure a timing parameter. The cover will begin moving — call stop_calibration when the desired endpoint is reached.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Safety timeout in seconds — motor will auto-stop if stop_calibration is not called

direction.name: Direction
direction.description: Direction to move during the test. If not set, auto-detects based on current position

stop_calibration.name: Stop calibration
stop_calibration.description: Stop an active calibration test. Calculates the result and saves it to the configuration unless cancelled.

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.description: If true, discard the test results without saving
